titleStmt.title: An English-mans loue to Bohemia with a friendly farewell to all the noble souldiers that goe from great Britaine to that honorable expedition. As also, the names of the most part of the kings, princes, dukes, marquisses, earles, bishops, and other friendly confederates, that are combined with the Bohemian part. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

titleStmt.title: An English-mans loue to Bohemia with a friendly farewell to all the noble souldiers that goe from great Britaine to that honorable expedition. As also, the names of the most part of the kings, princes, dukes, marquisses, earles, bishops, and other friendly confederates, that are combined with the Bohemian part. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; printed at London by George Eld (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
